headline: Multi-modal Truckload Stocks Face Supply Side Tightening, BofA Says
summary: Multi-modal truckload stocks, including J.B. Hunt Transport Services (JBHT) and Knight-Swift Transpo

headline: J.B. Hunt (JBHT) Is Up 7.8% After Expanding Credit Lines And Launching New Buyback Program
summary: J.B. Hunt Transport Services recently entered into a US$1.70 billion second amended and restated credit agreement, extending its US$1.00 billion revolving credit facility to 2030, adding up to US$700.00 million in term loan capacity, and lifting its accordion feature to as much as US$400.00 million. Alongside this expanded financing flexibility, the company’s new US$1.00 billion share repurchase authorization and ongoing cost program progress highlight management’s confidence in supporting...
